description: In a galaxy far, far away, there's a coffee shop in Atlanta called Banjo Cold Brew Coffee. Its co-founder, Billy Atchison, is a big fan of Star Wars—so much so that he created this cocktail in honor of the respected and unconventional Jedi master Qui-Gon Jinn.According to Atchinson, the sweetened cold-brew&nbsp;coffee gives it a strong edge, whereas the combination of the gin and lemon “ensures that any Jedi could keep his cool when negotiations seem to be failing."Look no further than the Qui-Gon Gin-Singer if you're looking for a Star Wars-themed cocktail to impress your friends.
name: Qui-Gon Gin-Singer
recipeIngredient: 6 oz. Banjo Sweetly Tuned cold-brew coffee

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the tonic into a highball glass filled with ice and set aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the tonic into a highball glass filled with ice and set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the gin and coffee into a mixing glass and stir.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the gin and coffee into a mixing glass and stir.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mixture over the tonic.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture over the tonic.

recipeInstructions.name: Express the oil of a lemon peel over the glass, and drop in to garnish.
recipeInstructions.text: Express the oil of a lemon peel over the glass, and drop in to garnish.
